description: The World Health Organization urges tough measures in France and elsewhere in Europe to save lives.
title: Coronavirus: France reports more than 30,000 new infections
title_page: Coronavirus: France reports more than 30,000 new infections - BBC News
maintext: Residents of Paris, its suburbs and eight other cities including Marseille and Lyon will not be able to leave their homes without "valid" reason between 21:00 and 06:00 from Saturday for at least four weeks. Mr Macron said he aimed to reduce the daily rise in cases to 3,000.
